overview: Elong E'nabe is the story of six year old Angela, a black girl with Senegalese roots born in Belgium. The region they in live now is known for it's nationalist right wing supporters. Unaware of the conflict they ended up in, the kids live a carefree life while their mother watches over them. The film paints a picture of what it is like to grow up as a child with a black skin color in Flanders.
title: A Bright Future
